data.name: AgeOfConsent_Description
data.value: A young person under the age of 16 years may sign here if they have been shown to have capacity.

data.name: CapacityTest_Description
data.value: Please confirm the patient has capacity to make this decision at this time

data.name: CJDRiskAssessment_Item1
data.value: Has the patient ever been officially informed that they are at an increased risk of CJD or vCJD

data.name: CJDRiskAssessment_Item2
data.value: If YES, has a formal risk assessment been carried out

data.name: FinalConsent_ConsentInformation
data.value: Confirmation of consent (to be completed by the patient and a health professional after the First Stage has been completed and within 72 hours of the procedure.). On behalf of the team treating the patient, the health professional has confirmed with the patient that he/she has no further questions and wishes the procedure to go ahead.

data.name: FirstStageConsentAdult_Paragraph1
data.value: Please read this form carefully. If the patient's treatment is being planned in advance, patient may be given a patient information leaflet about the procedure. If the patient has any further questions, please ask the responsible health professional(s) immediately.

data.name: FirstStageConsentAdult_Paragraph2
data.value: The patient has the right to change his/her mind at any time, including after signature is captured at this stage.

data.name: FirstStageConsentAdult_Paragraph3
data.value: The patient understands that health professionals cannot give him/her a guarantee that a particular person will perform the procedure. The person will, however, have appropriate experience and training.

data.name: FirstStageConsentAdult_Paragraph4
data.value: The patient understands that he/she will have the opportunity to discuss the details of anaesthesia with an anaesthetist before the procedure, unless the urgency of situation prevents this. (This only applies to patients having general or regional anaesthesia).

data.name: FirstStageConsentAdult_Paragraph5
data.value: The patient understands that any procedures in addition to those described on this form will only be carried out if it is necessary to save his/her life or to prevent serous harm to his/her health.

data.name: FirstStageConsentAdult_Paragraph6
data.value: The patient has been told about additional procedures which may become necessary during his/her treatment. The patient has listed below any procedures which he/she do not wish to be carried out without further discussion.

data.name: FirstStageConsentAdult_Subtitle1
data.value: Statement of ADULT patient and young people aged 16 years and above.

data.name: FirstStageConsentAdult_Subtitle2
data.value: A young person under the age of 16 years may sign here if they have been shown to have capacity.

data.name: FirstStageConsentProxy_Paragraph1
data.value: Please read this form carefully. If your treatment is being planned in advance, you may be given a patient information leaflet about the procedure. If you have any further questions, you must ask - we are here to help you.

data.name: FirstStageConsentProxy_Paragraph2
data.value: The parent/representative has the right to change his/her mind at any time, including after signature is captured at this stage.

data.name: FirstStageConsentProxy_Paragraph3
data.value: The parent/representative agrees to the procedure or course of treatment described on this form.

data.name: FirstStageConsentProxy_Paragraph4
data.value: The parent/representative understands that the health professionals cannot give a guarantee that a particular person will perform the procedure. the person will, however, have appropriate experience and training.

data.name: FirstStageConsentProxy_Paragraph5
data.value: The parent/representative understands that his/her child/client and himself/herself will have the opportunity to discuss the details of anaesthesia with an anaesthetist before the procedure, unless the urgency of the situation prevents this. (This only applies to children having general or regional anaesthesia).

data.name: FirstStageConsentProxy_Paragraph6
data.value: The parent/representative understands that any procedures in addition to those described on this form will only be carried out if it is necessary to save the life of his/her child/client or to prevent serous harm to his or her health.

data.name: FirstStageConsentProxy_Paragraph7
data.value: The parent/representative has been told about additional procedures which may become necessary during his/her child/client's treatment. The parent/representative has listed below any procedures which he/she do not wish to be carried out without further discussion.

data.name: FirstStageConsentProxy_Subtitle
data.value: Statement of parent or legal proxy for a CHILD under 16 years old and not legally competent

data.name: InterpreterSignature_Declaration
data.value: I have interpreted the information to the patient to the best of my ability and in a way in which I believe the patient can understand.

data.name: LanguageAssessment_Description
data.value: Please confirm patient understands English language

data.name: MedicalStudents_Agreement1
data.value: The patient/parent agrees that in the interests of training competent health care professionals for the future students may be allowed to observe the patient's/child's operation

data.name: MedicalStudents_Agreement2
data.value: The patient/parents agrees that in the interests of education, medical students may be allowed to contribute to the patient's/child's operation on the understanding that their contribution is fully supervised and within their current experience and competence

data.name: MedicalStudents_Agreement3
data.value: The patient/parent agrees to photography and/or videos taken during the procedure for the purpose of adding dinical information to my medical notes. Additional consent is required for these images to be used for any other purpose

data.name: MedicalStudents_Title
data.value: INVOLVEMENT OF MEDICAL/NURSING STUDENTS AND PHOTOGRAPHY/FILMING

data.name: Qualification_Description
data.value: Please confirm that you are trained to take consent for this procedure or qualified to perform the procedure?

data.name: Qualification_Header
data.value: Are you qualified to take Consent?

data.name: ConsentStage_Description
data.value: Please choose appropriate consent stage from the following options

data.name: Watermark_Benefits
data.value: Please enter benefits of the procedure

data.name: Watermark_HealthProfessionalContactNumber
data.value: Please enter the health professional's contact number (if applicable)

data.name: Watermark_PatientDOB
data.value: Please enter the patient's date of birth

data.name: Watermark_PersonFirstName
data.value: Please enter the person's first name

data.name: Watermark_PersonJobTitle
data.value: Please enter the person's job title

data.name: Watermark_Procedures
data.value: Please enter the name of the procedure

data.name: Watermark_Risks
data.value: Please enter risks of the procedure

data.name: Watermark_PersonRoleOrRelationship
data.value: Please enter the person's role or relationship

data.name: Watermark_PatientSpecialRequirements
data.value: Please enter patient's special requirements (if applicable)

data.name: Witness_InterpreterInfo
data.value: INTERPRETER (where appropriate): I have interpreted the information above to the patient to the best of my ability and in a way in which I believe the patient can understand.

data.name: Witness_WitnessInformation1
data.value: A witness should sign below if the patient is unable to sign but has indicated his or her consent.

data.name: Witness_WitnessInformation2
data.value: Young people aged 16 or 17 years old and children with capacity may also like a parent to sign here.

data.name: AgeOfConsent_Confrimation
data.value: Please confirm if the young person wish to consent for himself/herself.

data.name: Watermark_HealthProfessionalJobTitle
data.value: Please enter the health professional's job title

data.name: Watermark_HealthProfessionalFullName
data.value: Please enter the health professional's full name

data.name: Common_InterpreterFullName
data.value: Please enter the interpreter's full name

data.name: Watermark_HealthProfessionalFirstName
data.value: Please enter the health professional's first name

data.name: Watermark_HealthProfessionalSurname
data.value: Please enter the health professional's surname

data.name: Watermark_InterpreterFullName
data.value: Please enter the interpreter's full name

data.name: Watermark_ParentOrRepresentativeFullName
data.value: Please enter the parent or representative's full name

data.name: Watermark_PatientFirstName
data.value: Please enter the patient's first name

data.name: Watermark_PatientFullName
data.value: Please enter the patient's full name

data.name: Watermark_PatientOrRepresentativeFullName
data.value: Please enter the patient or representative's full name

data.name: Watermark_WitnessFullName
data.value: Please enter the witness's full name

data.name: ValidationMessage_TelephoneNumberValidation
data.value: The contact number must be in a valid format, i.e, +44 0203 299 9000

data.name: Watermark_Description
data.value: Please enter description for your procedure

data.name: ValidationMessage_RequiredField
data.value: This field can not be empty

data.name: Watermark_AnaesthesiaOther
data.value: Please enter the details here if other anaesthesia is required

data.name: CapacityDetails_DoesPatientHaveASoundedMind
data.value: Is there an impairment of or disturbance in the functioning of the patient's mind or brain?

data.name: CapacityDetails_DoesPatientLackCapacityToDecide
data.value: On the balance of probabilities, based on the evidence above, does the patient HAVE the capacity to make this particular decision at this moment in time?

data.name: CapacityDetails_DoesPatientUnderstandInformationProvided
data.value: Is the patient able to understand the information relating to the decision to be made?

data.name: CapacityDetails_IsPatientAbleToCommunicateDecision
data.value: Is the patient able to communicate their decision, by any means possible, if necessary with the help of speech and language therapists?

data.name: CapacityDetails_IsPatientAbleToRetainInformationProvided
data.value: Is the patient able to retain the information relating to the decision to be made?

data.name: CapacityDetails_IsPatientAbleToUseInfromationProvided
data.value: Is the patient able to use the information to enable them to make an informed decision?

data.name: CapacityDetails_SupportProvided
data.value: Please enter the details of support provided to the patient to enable them to make the decision themselves

data.name: Watermark_Evidence
data.value: Please provide evidence for your answer

data.name: Watermark_FollowupCare
data.value: Please enter follow-up cares of the procedure

data.name: Watermark_IsPatientConscious
data.value: What is the reason for a Capacity Assessment, i.e., behaviour, circumstances, concerns, medical diagnosis and etc.?

data.name: Watermark_SupportProvided
data.value: Attends with someone who knows them well Enough time allowed Best time of the day Using communication methods that the patient understands

data.name: CapacityDetails_IsLackOfCapacityPermanent
data.value: Is the capacity loss likely to be PERMANENT?

data.name: AssentDetails_AdvanceDecisionIsInPlace
data.value: If the decision relates to treatment, is there an advance decision in place? (Important in cases where life-sustaining treatment is being refused)

data.name: AssentDecision_AssentDecisionDescription
data.value: The decision made, on the basis of all the facts and views expressed

data.name: AssentDetails_DOLSRequired
data.value: Is it necessary to consider issues around Deprivation of Liberty?

data.name: AssentDetails_LPAIsAvailable
data.value: Is there anyone with lasting powers of attorney for welfare or a court deputy for making health decisions? (Note that some LPAs are for financial affairs only)

data.name: AssentDetails_PatientFriendFamilyWillingToBeConsulted
data.value: Are the patient's friends/family appropriate and willing to be consulted?

data.name: AssentDetails_PatientHasExpressedAView
data.value: Has the patient expressed a view?

data.name: AssentDetails_PatientHasFriendFamilyToConsult
data.value: Does the patient have friends/family who can be consulted?

data.name: Watermark_AssentFinalDecision
data.value: Please enter the details of decision made, on the basis of all the facts and views expressed

data.name: Watermark_DecisionMakerFullName
data.value: Please enter the decision maker's full name

data.name: Watermark_DecisionMakerJobTitle
data.value: Please enter the decision maker's job title

data.name: AssentDecision_AssentDecisionConfirmation
data.value: I confirm that the decision made on behalf of the patient was reached after careful consideration of all the facts and the views expressed by those with an interest in the patient's welfare. I consider the decision to be in the best interests of the patient and is the least restrictive option available.
